name: Street Killers Showdown
description:
This is my first project, I would really like to show it!
The game is a hardcore endless runner
You can turn on english language in game settings!

The street is a mess, only you can clean up the streets of the city from all the bandits, thanks to your decisive actions!

  • Adrenaline-fueled soundtrack
  • Different types of enemies and bosses
  • Interaction with the environment
  • Various game mechanics of characters
  • Improvement system
